meanings.definition: The act of removing sulfur from something.
meanings.sent1: The desulfurizations of the fuel were necessary to reduce pollution.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the desulfurizations of the oil to make it cleaner.
meanings.sent3: The desulfurizations of the smelly gas made it much more pleasant to be around.
meanings.sent4: Her diligent desulfurizations of the water supply purified it like magic.
meanings.sent5: The desulfurizations of the soil transformed it into a healthier environment for plants.

meanings.definition: The process of eliminating sulfur from a substance.
meanings.sent1: The desulfurizations of the metal were successful in removing impurities.
meanings.sent2: Chemical plants often use desulfurizations to improve the quality of their products.
meanings.sent3: The desulfurizations of the stinky liquid turned it into a clear and odorless solution.
meanings.sent4: The desulfurizations of the coal were like a purification ritual for the miners.
meanings.sent5: Her meticulous desulfurizations of the gas sample impressed her colleagues.
